mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(ADD_VAL1,',',ADD_VAL2,',',ADD_VAL3) AS sms FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_020'

SELECT A.BIKE_ID AS BIKE_ID ,A.RACK_ID AS RACK_ID ,A.BIKE_NO AS BIKE_NO FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT ,ROB.BIKE_ID ,ROB.RACK_ID ,(SELECT BIKE_NO FROM TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = ROB.BIKE_ID) AS BIKE_NO ,REG_DTTM FROM spb.TB_OPR_ROB_BRI ROB left outer join TB_OPR_ALARM_HIST HIST ON ROB.BIKE_ID = HIST.BIKE_ID and HIST.ALARM_DTTM <= (NOW()- INTERVAL CONVERT((SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_018'), UNSIGNED) minute) WHERE REG_DTTM BETWEEN (NOW()- INTERVAL CONVERT((SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_018'), UNSIGNED) minute) AND NOW() GROUP BY ROB.BIKE_ID ) A WHERE A.CNT >= (SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_019')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `spb`.`TB_OPR_ALARM_HIST` ( RACK_ID , BIKE_ID , BIKE_STUS_CD , LOCK_STUS_CD , ALARM_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{RACK_ID} , #{BIKE_ID} , '' , '' , NOW() )
